name: Number Dash - HD
description:
Do you think you're good at math? How fast can you perform simple math operations?. Number Dash is a collection of challenging and fast-paced math games which will keep you on edge.

Right or Wrong - Check whether the given equation is correct or not

Tap the Numbers -Tap on the numbers in the ascending order

Addition Mania - Choose the correct answer for the given equation

Key Features

- Easy to learn and hard to master gameplay
- Multiple games
- Engaging UI design
- Share your score with friends
- Game Center leaderboards
